title: Service Interruption (June 30) - Working to resolve
body:
Tonight, one of our ISP providers suffered a major disruption and are working to resolve. Things appear to be stabilizing, but I can see that a number of you are reporting that you cannot login. We are looking into it now and trying to see what is causing this for you.

I will update this thread as soon as I know more. We are working now though, and hope to have resolution soon.

-Riot Cochese

**EDIT July 1 - 1:56pm AEST** 
We did see a disruption for some of our Telstra and Vodafone NZ players about an hour ago. Everything appears to have stabilized at this time. We do not see anything on our end that would prevent access to league and the game servers are running.

replies.body:
Just an update to let you all know we are still working on this. I don't have any new info to share at this time, but please post here if you are having problems.

Also - please let us know which ISP you are using, when posting about issues. It will help us and all of you better understand who is affected by this incident.
im with telstra
Starting to see improvements...is anyone that was having issues, able to login now?

I'm now unable to login.  
I'm with Vodafone/Telstra.  
EDIT: Finally connected to my game and the enemy team was nearly in the base. Do we get loss forgiven for this? I was lvl1 when the enemy team was all lvl8+
All good now.  Thanks Cochese!
Just got in. Thanks!

It's not riot's fault, its Telstra, i cannot connect to any game server, not just league but every other game i cannot connect to, meanwhile im in teamspeak with a friend and can watch videos on youtube etc. its Telstra's fuck up

We did see a disruption for some of our Telstra and Vodafone NZ players about an hour ago. Everything appears to have stabilized at this time. We do not see anything on our end that would prevent access to league and the game servers are running.

I have been having ongoing issues, i managed to get back on and play for most of today, tried to log on a minute ago and its stuffing up again? is this anything to do with Telstra? Is the issue supposed to be resolved yet? Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=TRASH B0AT,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=R1u8d791,comment-id=001f0000,timestamp=2015-07-02T08:13:45.197+0000)
>
> I have been having ongoing issues, i managed to get back on and play for most of today, tried to log on a minute ago and its stuffing up again? is this anything to do with Telstra? Is the issue supposed to be resolved yet? Thanks

Sorry to hear that, please do this and we will take a look at what your routing looks like: http://riot.com/1BctS2j then email results to ocelivereports@riotgames.com
LoL client keeps telling me to reconnect to game even when my internet browser is working fine, really hope I don't get another leavebuster warning

I have deleted all of leagues files and downloaded them again and could play for about a day with no interruption, however about an hour ago i disconnected from the server and am getting stuck on the login screen again

We believe this incident is now resolved. It took longer than we would like, and we will be looking deeper into our back up plans for disruptions like this. I do apologize to everyone that was affected by this tonight. I promise we are working on making this better, and to improve based off of tonights issues.

Thank you,
Riot Cochese

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cochese,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=R1u8d791,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2015-06-30T14:03:49.583+0000)
>
> We believe this incident is now resolved.

So since 6pm New Zealand time ive had constant 800 ping in ARAM, this happens to me several times a month and im on (yet again) a 20 minute leaverbuster

can you address this issue?
can you stop falsely punishing us for problems caused by your servers?
can i stop having to wait 20 minutes just to play a game with trolls that report me for being afk?

we don't want ocean week we don't want chroma packs  we want you to address this problem, fix it permanently and remove leaver buster punishments that were caused by your servers

> [{quoted}](name=QtoWin,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=R1u8d791,comment-id=00160001,timestamp=2015-07-01T06:49:34.290+0000)
>
> So since 6pm New Zealand time ive had constant 800 ping in ARAM, this happens to me several times a month and im on (yet again) a 20 minute leaverbuster
> 
> can you address this issue?
> can you stop falsely punishing us for problems caused by your servers?
> can i stop having to wait 20 minutes just to play a game with trolls that report me for being afk?
> 
> we don't want ocean week we don't want chroma packs  we want you to address this problem, fix it permanently and remove leaver buster punishments that were caused by your servers

There are three key components to playing League:

1) Your home setup (PC ->cat 5 cable ->modem/router, nobody overloading your network in the background, as an example)
2) Your ISP (Follow the steps here: http://riot.com/1BctS2j then email results to ocelivereports@riotgames.com) Are you with Vodafone NZ by chance? (there was a disruption with their service earlier today, and we did see players from that ISP drop games and then stabilize)
3) Riot and League of Legends 

As for leaverbuster, it takes more than one leave to get penalties. There is a pattern of behaviour that Leaverbuster punishes for.
Removing people's queue bans cause of this DC would be a good start.
It`s back again riot... i can`t play please fix it fast.......

Mates, we see a pattern in this thread of players with Telstra. We are working to resolve and help those affected by the disruption we had about an hour ago. I am sorry for those that were affected and continue to be.

We hope to have this working soon, this is our top priority.
